page.title: 18BARCOMBE SCHOOL P.T.A.
page.content: {A Report by Class 1.} Barcombe School Parent Teachers Association play a major role in providing extra financial help for the school and organising social events for the local Community. They have had a particularly good fund raising year so far,in an effort to provide the school with a second computer.The events and sums raised are as follows for the year 84/85: {Date. Events. Sums Raised. {10.12.84. Car wash. Â£55.00 {29.4.85. Spring Fair. Â£243.00 {26.5.85. Brass Band Â£1500.00 { Dance and {Supper. {23.6.85. Family Ramble. Â£40.00 } {______ {Â£1838.00
